item.title: âœ… Last week's post
item.description:
Insanity is the exact repetition of the same action, over and over again, in the hope of a change.

Monday

On Monday, I was in remote classes, after which I completed the work “The Spigot algorithm in C++” for Tuesday on the subject of “Computer workshop”. I rested in the evening.

Tuesday

On Tuesday, I attended classes at the institute, after which I went home, and then went to the volleyball section, rested in the evening.

Wednesday

On Wednesday, I was in class at the institute, the first pair for me was next to the main building, and the second was in the building of my faculty. At home, I was creating a presentation on Thursday on the subject “Fundamentals of Russian Statehood” about the Museum of Cosmonautics in Moscow. I rested in the evening.

Thursday

On Thursday, I attended classes at the institute, where I told a presentation that I was preparing, and on Wednesday I defended my Laboratory work on the subject of “Programming Technology”. I rested after the steam.

Friday

Before the institute, I was preparing for the “solution essay” for English, in which I later wrote it. After graduation, I rested and began to carry out the second stage of the implementation of an individual project for the “Operating Systems” project.
